deletepagesforgood-deletepagetitle: This message is for saying: you are about to permanently delete the current page.
deletepagesforgood-delete_permanently:
This message is under the action menu.

It deletes the current page permanently.
deletepagesforgood-del_impossible: This messages says that there is an error and that the page cannot be deleted permanently.
deletepagesforgood-ask_deletion: This message is giving you a warning before you continue and says are you sure you want to continue deleting this page permanently.
deletepagesforgood-del_done: This message says that the page was successfully deleted permanently.
